text: So jiss shaks ko Allah Taalaa raastay per daalna chahaye uss key seenay ko islam kay liye kushada ker deta hai aur jiss ko bey raah rakhna chahaye uss kay seenay ko boht tang ker deta hai jaisay koi aasman mein charhta hai issi tarah Allah Taalaa eman na laney walo per na paki musallat ker deta hai
